body:
Hey guys,

So if anyone knows the answer to this, feel free to help me out :P. But this is more directed toward the staff team, when do applications re-open? I'm considering applying again; football is coming to a close, and Winter is approaching. Won't have anything to do, and I really enjoyed it when I was a Staff member. So, might as well.

-Jake
body_tagged:

title: When do Staff Applications re-open?

replies.body: I think next year maybe January or February or later depends on when they need staff.
replies.body_tagged: I think next year maybe January or February or later depends on when they need staff.

replies.body: There is no exact date for when they will open. I can say that it is likely to open in a while.
replies.body_tagged: There is no exact date for when they will open. I can say that it is likely to open in a while.

replies.body:
Bearing in mind we're not finished with the batches at the moment, don't expect them to open till Spring 2016.
Glad to know you're back Jake! ;)

replies.body:

replies.body:
Technically you can, we had 4 Admins before.
(Kylo, Pop, Peachy, Mango)

But if Jake decided to return, I doubt he'd get Admin because he's been away for too long. 
Having said that, he'll definitely get Mod if he returned.
